H0.text: when is the new tappan zee bridge going to be finished. December 31, 2017

H1.text: when is the new tappan zee bridge going to be finished. March 30, 2019

H2.text: when is the new tappan zee bridge going to be finished. August 15, 2018

H3.text: when is the new tappan zee bridge going to be finished. June 15 , 2018

A4.text: The new southbound/eastbound span was supposed to open to traffic on September 8, 2018.

A5.text: An opening ceremony for the south span was held on September 7, 2018, and traffic started using the new span three days later.

A7.text: The eastbound span opened to traffic on September 11, 2018.

A8.text: The northbound/westbound span opened on August 25, 2017.
